data.title: SiteGround Managed VPS
data.text:
Feature SiteGround offers Essentials Control Panels SiteGround offers its custom control panel called Site Tools on its cloud hosting servers. While it doesn't have the same extensive feature set as cPanel, Site Tools is designed to be intuitive and efficient for managing your cloud hosting account. Backups SiteGround automatically saves daily backups and keeps 7 copies of your cloud account. For an additional layer of security these backups may be stored in a data center located in another city, state or country. In addition to SiteGround's automated backups, customers can generate up to 5 free backups on demand from their control panel. Each of them is kept for 7 days.

Feature SiteGround offers Basics OS Fedora Root Access No root access Dedicated IP The cloud account provides you with the independence and peace of mind of having your own Dedicated IP. Support Management Level Fully Managed Service: DevOps configure and manage your cloud account. Support Channels Cloud issues reported on chat or ticket are assigned with priority to SiteGround's most experienced support agents available. Monitoring Unknown Auto Scalable SiteGround's cloud platform is ready for your growth. You can add CPU and RAM at any time with a click. You can also use SiteGround's auto-scale option, which automatically adds more resources during unexpected traffic spikes, preventing traffic loss and downtime. Auto Security Updates Unknown Premium SSL Certificates SiteGround automatically issues a Letâ€™s Encrypt SSL certificate for every domain that SiteGround detects as hosted on your cloud plan. Cloudflare CDN SiteGround offers free CDN service with all plans to make your site faster when you have visitors from different geographical locations. Free Domain Unknown Staging You can easily create a fully-functional copy of your WordPress or WooCommerce shop and test major changes safely before applying them on your production site. The tool also automatically backs up your current site before each staging upload. Other Firewall Unknown DDoS protection SiteGround offer various means of DDOS protection and here are some of its key features: - A hardware firewall filtering flooding traffic; - A local software firewall based on iptables with more complex functions and traffic monitoring; - All services have a limit for the number of connections a remote host can establish; 1 Click Launch App WordPress can be easily installed on your cloud, through our auto-installation tools. Caching Speed up your WordPress and Woo sites with SiteGround's SG Optimizer plugin through smart dynamic caching and multiple other performance optimizations. Migrations SiteGround offers free automated transfers. SiteGround also provides professional website migration services for as low as $30.00/site. SiteGround's experts will do all the work for you, transferring your files and databases! Extra Random Extras

Git integration

Collaboration tools

White-label Reselling

Easy WordPress installation and management
